sentence.Network_en: It was as if Osmond deliberately , almost malignantly, had put the lights out one by one.
sentence.Network_cn: 仿佛奥斯蒙德怀着幸灾乐祸的心情, 在有意识地把灯一盏一盏吹灭.

sentence.Network_en: Neck of uterus can live after scalelike cell cancer performs an operation malignantly successfully how long?
sentence.Network_cn: 宫颈鳞状细胞癌恶性做手术成功后能活多久?

sentence.Network_en: Although some people attack him malignantly, the advantages of him are outweighed the disadvantages in fact.
sentence.Network_cn: 虽然一些人对他进行恶毒的攻击, 但实际上他的优点还是远大于缺点.

means.word_mean: 1. in a malignant manner, as of a tumor that spreads
